p: Demographic and clinical data were extracted from the surveillance networkâ€™s de-identified database. Continuous variables were summarized using mean and standard deviation (SD), and categorical variables were summarized using frequencies and percentages. Continuous data were compared using parametric Student test and rates using the Chi-square and Fisher exact test. Statistical significance was set at the 5% level. Analyses were conducted using STATA software (version 14.0; StatCorp LP, College Station, TX, USA).
